name: Marak Squires
bio: An early adopter and boisterous evangelist of node.js, Marak has over ten years professional development experience ranging from small-government to enterprise. He's worked in a variety of fields building full-stack solutions for real-time data and video, and now dislikes working in anything but node.js. In addition to contributing to and maintaining over 100 open-source projects, Marak has written, produced, and starred in several rap music videos about technology.
